content.raw:
It looks like you may have ended up with a bad combination of libraries. You could try uninstalling everything and starting over:

~~~
sudo apt-get remove '.*gazebo.*' '.*sdformat.*' '.*ignition-math.*' '.*ignition-msgs.*' '.*ignition-transport.*'
~~~

If the problem persists, what's the output of these commands:

~~~
gazebo --version
~~~

~~~
ldd `which gazebo` | grep ign
~~~
content.html:
It looks like you may have ended up with a bad combination of libraries. You could try uninstalling everything and starting over:

sudo apt-get remove '.*gazebo.*' '.*sdformat.*' '.*ignition-math.*' '.*ignition-msgs.*' '.*ignition-transport.*'

If the problem persists, what's the output of these commands:

gazebo --version

ldd `which gazebo` | grep ign
